title: remove unused BitUtil code
description: There is some dead unused and untested code here.. we should nuke it.

comments.author: Uwe Schindler
comments.content: +1. If its no longer used, nuke it. Especially because this contains of endless random-like numbers in large arrays. Likely to break if somebody accidentally edits one number. And there are no tests at all!

comments.author: ASF subversion and git services
